attributes.action: address the safety of public transport - reduce bomb threats on buses and at train stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today's bomb, which has ripped through a crowded passenger bus near Sri Lanka's capital during morning rush hour, killing at least 21 people and wounding another 47, the second attack in three days targeting civilians highlights how vulnerable the public is to un - named blasts.

The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to address how attacks by yeller- ist terrorists can still strike deep inside government territory despite a maze of security checkpoints around capitals and its suburbs.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
